hanzi-su-wiki:
運

Значения

Перевозить; судьба

Мнемоника

  • Движение 辶 войск 軍 решает судьбы сражений.

  • Автомобиль 車 перевозит матрас (как 冖) по дороге (как 辶).

Варианты

运

purpleculture_examples:

heisig_chinese_memo: Don’t confuse it with “take along” (287). In that one, there was a car so you could take along your friends once you found them on the road. In this one, there is an army chariot just to carry military supplies (sorry no room for you).
heisig_constituent: carry, army, chariot, crown, vehicle, car, road
heisig_story: A long string of "sweet" chariots "swinging low" to our roads is a sure sign that the Lord is "comin' for to carry" someone home.
myStory: армию в пути спасет только удача
Keyword_KANJIDIC: carry, luck, destiny, fate, lot, transport, progress, advance
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: кэрри, удача, судьба, судьба, много, транспорт, прогресс, продвижение
koohiiStory1: Don’t confuse it with “take along” (287). In that one, there was a car so you could take along your friends once you found them on the road. In this one, there is an army chariot just to carry military supplies (sorry no room for you).
koohiiStory2: Roads carry armies (in contrast to seas carrying navies or skies carrying air forces).

運河(うんが): canal

運動(うんどう): motion, exercise

不運(ふうん): unlucky, misfortune, bad luck, fate

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When you ride your scooter, your forehead sticks out of the car, so you have to carry it. The scooter doesn't fit in the car when you aren't on it though, so you have to carry it out the window. And it takes a lot of luck not to get clipped by a car or accidentally take out a pedestrian with it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine trying to carry your scooter out the window. Your forehead is still sticking out of the car as you do this.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you carry the scooter, your luck turns, and it starts to rain, so you pull out your umbrella (うん). Now you're holding your scooter, your forehead, and an umbrella outside of the car.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: It's hard enough to carry a scooter while you drive, but now you have to try to keep yourself and it dry with an umbrella too.
Ru_Meaning: carry, luck, destiny, fate, lot, transport, progress, advance
Ru_Notes: Значения можно неуклюже обобщить в "ведение, везение".

Ru_trainchinese: yùn: (глаг/сущ) перевозить, транспортировать; двигаться, вращаться; использовать, применять; удача
Kanshudo_mnemonic: when the army (軍) moves (⻌) it carries its luck
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Don’t confuse it with “take along” (287). In that one, there was a car so you could take along your friends once you found them on the road. In this one, there is an army chariot just to carry military supplies (sorry no room for you).
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "辵", "军", the original meaning is movement. "Shuowen": "Migration. Congyou, military sound." "Mozi·Datake": "Everyone who lives fortune and enters into it is all right, and the reason for going is wrong." Zhang In the pure one episode, Bi Yuan said: "Dwelling, living or moving."

" Fortune " can mean rotation and rotation. "Zhuangzi•The Way of Heaven": "The way of heaven is fortune but nothing is accumulated, so everything comes into being."

" Fortune " can also mean long distance in space. "Shu‧Da Yumo": "The emperor's virtue and prosperity are sages and gods, and martial arts are literary." Kong Chuan: "Guangzhou says that those who are overthrown are great, and luck is that those who are far away are far."

" Fortune " also means use. "Southern History-Qi Lin Ruhou Tan's Biography": "The imperial luck can't be beaten by boxing and fall to the ground."

" Yun " said Luck. "Book of Jin-Biography of Wen Yuan-Cao Pi": "If you wish to be victorious, you will be Qinghui, and when you Shen, your dragon will be scattered.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "辵", "军", the original meaning is movement.
humanum_full_description:
從「辵」，「軍」聲，本義為移動。《說文》：「迻徙也。从辵，軍聲。」 《墨子‧大取》：「諸以居運命者，苟入於其中者，皆是也，去之因非也。」張純一集解引畢沅曰：「居運，言居住或運徙。」

　　「運」可表示運轉、轉動。《莊子‧天道》：「天道運而無所積，故萬物成。」成玄英疏：「運，動也，轉也。」

　　「運」亦可表示謂空間距離遠。《書‧大禹謨》：「帝德廣運，乃聖乃神，乃武乃文。」孔傳：「廣謂所覆者大，運謂所及者遠。」

　　「運」也表示使用。《南史‧齊臨汝侯坦之傳》：「帝運拳擊坦之不著，倒地。」

　　「運」還表示運氣。《晉書‧文苑傳‧曹毗》：「運屈則紆其清暉，時申則散其龍藻。」

Pinyin: yùn
English Definition: to move; to transport; to use; to apply; fortune; luck; fate
Total strokes: 13; Radical: 辵
Pictophonetic: 軍 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.

  • ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 軍 [ jūn ] army, military; soldiers, troops

運行 [ yùn xíng ]: to move along one's course (of celestial bodies etc); (fig.) to function; to be in operation; (of a train service etc) to operate; to run; (of a computer) to run

  • ⿺ Surround from lower left

①循序移動：運行。運動。運轉(zhuàn)。
②搬送：運輸。運載。運營(交通工具的運行和營業)。運力。運銷。空運。海運。
③使用：運用。運算。運筆。運籌(制定策略)。
④人的遭遇，亦特指迷信的人所說的遭遇：運氣。命運。幸運。國運。
⑤南北距離：廣運百里。
⑥姓氏。

運用(うんよう): making use of, application, investment, practical use
運営(うんえい): management, administration, operation
運送(うんそう): shipping, marine transportation
運賃(うんちん): freight rates, shipping expenses, fare

運命(うんめい): fate

運(うん): fortune, luck
運河(うんが): canal
運転(うんてん): operation, motion, driving
運動(うんどう): motion, exercise
幸運(こううん): good luck, fortune
不運(ふうん): unlucky, misfortune, bad luck, fate

從「 辵 」，「 軍 」聲，本義為移動。《說文》：「迻徙也。从辵，軍聲。」 《墨子‧大取》：「諸以居運命者，苟入於其中者，皆是也，去之因非也。」張純一集解引畢沅曰：「居運，言居住或運徙。」 「 運 」可表示運轉、轉動。《莊子‧天道》：「天道運而無所積，故萬物成。」成玄英疏：「運，動也，轉也。」 「 運 」亦可表示謂空間距離遠。《書‧大禹謨》：「帝德廣運，乃聖乃神，乃武乃文。」孔傳：「廣謂所覆者大，運謂所及者遠。」 「 運 」也表示使用。《南史‧齊臨汝侯坦之傳》：「帝運拳擊坦之不著，倒地。」 「 運 」還表示運氣。《晉書‧文苑傳‧曹毗》：「運屈則紆其清暉，時申則散其龍藻。」
From the sound of " 辵", " 军", the original meaning is movement. "Shuowen": "Migration. Congyou, military sound." "Mozi·Datake": "Everyone who lives fortune and enters into it is all right, and the reason for going is wrong." Zhang In the pure one episode, Bi Yuan said: "Dwelling, living or moving." " Fortune" can mean rotation and rotation. "Zhuangzi•The Way of Heaven": "The way of heaven is fortune but nothing is accumulated, so everything comes into being." " Fortune" can also mean long distance in space. "Shu‧Da Yumo": "The emperor's virtue and prosperity are sages and gods, and martial arts are literary." Kong Chuan: "Guangzhou says that those who are overthrown are great, and luck is that those who are far away are far." " Fortune" also means use. "Southern History-Qi Lin Ruhou Tan's Biography": "The imperial luck can't be beaten by boxing and fall to the ground." " Yun" said Luck. "Book of Jin-Biography of Wen Yuan-Cao Pi": "If you wish to be victorious, you will be Qinghui, and when you Shen, your dragon will be scattered.

運字的基本解释

運
yùn
见“运”。

運字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yùn］
［《廣韻》王問切，去問，云。］
“运1”的繁体字。
(1)移动；挪动。
(2)运转；转动。
(3)挥动；使用。
(4)谓资金周转。
(5)行驶。
(6)运载；搬运。
(7)运用。
(8)玩弄；拨弄。
(9)世运；国运。
(10)命运；运气。
(11)谓空间距离远。
(12)直径。参见“運寸”。
(13)通“煇（暈）”。日月周围的光圈。
(14)通“暈”。眩晕；昏厥。
(15)通“渾”。浑浊。
(16)运河的简称。
(17)通“鄆”。古地名。春秋莒邑。

運字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　運； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1261第18
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【正韻】禹慍切【集韻】【韻會】王問切，?音韻。【玉篇】轉也，動也。【正韻】行也，用也。【易·繫辭】日月運行。【書·大禹謨】帝德廣運。【註】行之不息也。【禮·少儀】君子欠伸運笏。【註】運，動也。　又【說文】移徙也。【廣韻】轉輸也。【後漢·百官志】尉曹主卒徒轉運事。　又【正韻】天造曰運。【渾天儀】天運如車轂。　又【韻會】五運，五行氣化流轉之名。　又運祚，曆數也。【史記·高帝贊】漢承堯運。　又【集韻】地南北謂之運。【越語】廣運百里。註：遠行賦東西爲廣，南北爲運。　又叶于分切，音云。【蔡邕·述行賦】彌信宿而後闋，思逶迤以東運。見陽光之顥顥，懷少弭而有欣。　又叶于願切，音院。【阮瑀·琴歌】奕奕天門開，大魏應期運。靑蓋巡九州，在西東人怨。

考證：〔【禮·曲禮】君子欠伸運笏。〕　謹照原文曲禮改少儀。〔【越語】廣運百里。東西爲廣，南北爲運。〕　謹照原文百里下增註字。〔【蔡邕·遠行賦】彌信宿而後闋，繇威遺以東

Basic explanation of words
Luck
yùn

Luck
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yùn］
["Guangyun" Wang Wenqie, go and ask, Yun. ]
Traditional characters for "运1".
(1) Move; move.
(2) Running; rotating.
(3) Wave; use.
(4) Referred to as capital turnover.
(5) Driving.
(6) Carrying; handling.
(7) Use.
(8) Fiddle; fiddle.
(9) World Games; National Games.
(10) Fate; luck.
(11) It is said that the spatial distance is far.
(12) Diameter. See "Shipping inch".
(13) Through "Hui (Halo)". The aperture around the sun and the moon.
(14) Through "halo". Dizziness; fainting.
(15) Through "muddy". turbid.
(16) Abbreviation for canal.
(17) Through "Yun". Ancient place names. Spring and Autumn Juyi.
Luck
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　 Yun; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1261, 18
[Ancient text]? [Guangyun] [Zhengyun] Yu Yuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Wang Wenqie,? Sound rhyme. [Jade articles] Turn and move. Old glyph
Luck
Name meaning
Nothing.
yùn
вм. 运

運

Значения

Перевозить; судьба

Мнемоника

  • Движение 辶 войск 軍 решает судьбы сражений.

  • Автомобиль 車 перевозит матрас (как 冖) по дороге (как 辶).

Варианты

运

Radicals: 冖, 車  (forehead, car, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
When you ride your scooter, your forehead sticks out of the car, so you have to carry it. The scooter doesn't fit in the car when you aren't on it though, so you have to carry it out the window. And it takes a lot of luck not to get clipped by a car or accidentally take out a pedestrian with it.
Imagine trying to carry your scooter out the window. Your forehead is still sticking out of the car as you do this.
Reading Mnemonic
As you carry the scooter, your luck turns, and it starts to rain, so you pull out your umbrella (うん). Now you're holding your scooter, your forehead, and an umbrella outside of the car.
It's hard enough to carry a scooter while you drive, but now you have to try to keep yourself and it dry with an umbrella too.
